comment.body: I was in search for nice way to share files, and I became aware recently that I can just open any file(s)/folder(s) in torrent client and simply post short string of text symbols like dbf535eded36efd5e383dccd60c0805a237861aa and it will be enough to other person to download my stuff. Do you know about that way to share files? Why do I/We/You need something else?

@Lain: I use BTSync software. It is p2p and it allows you to share folder between 2 or many computers. So you just copy something into specific folder on one computer and all other computers will have it too. Of course those computers must have BTSync software active. And it is also another way to share files with other people.
